laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Seventh hospital day: conjugated bilirubin 1.2 mg/dL, total bilirubin 1.5 mg/dL, AST 63 U/L, ALT 62 U/L, alkaline phosphatase 300 U/L.

findings.white_cell_count: 2467/mm³ (5% neutrophils, 6% lymphocytes, 5% monocytes, 4% eosinophils, 80% nonhematologic cells)
findings.cytology: Benign mesothelial cells, no malignant cells.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Mass in the right hepatic lobe, 6.0 cm, heterogeneous configuration, suspected metastases.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: New focal lesions developed in the left hepatic lobe, each 8.0 to 9.0 mm diameter, suspected to be metastases.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Left pleural effusion, air-space disease visible in left upper lobe.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Second CT scan two weeks later showed progression with bilateral nodular and patchy opacities.

laboratory_examinations.findings: A few acid-fast bacilli, cultures negative.
